_comment: English translations for Go Cheat Code

go.description: Go is an open source programming language that makes it easy to build simple, reliable, and efficient software.

hello.go.title: hello.go

変数.title: Variables
変数.code:
var s1 string
s1 = "Learn Go!"

// declare multiple variables at once
var b, c int = 1, 2
var d = true

短縮宣言.title: Short Declaration
短縮宣言.code:
s1 := "Learn Go!"        // string
b, c := 1, 2             // int
d := true                // bool

関数.title: Functions

コメント.title: Comments

文字列.title: Strings
文字列.code:
s1 := "Hello" + "World"

s2 := `A "raw" string literal
can include line breaks.`

// Outputs: 10
fmt.Println(len(s1))

// Outputs: Hello
fmt.Println(string(s1[0:5]))

数値.title: Numbers
数値.code:
num := 3         // int
num := 3.        // float64
num := 3 + 4i    // complex128
num := byte('a') // byte (alias: uint8)

var u uint = 7        // uint (unsigned)
var p float32 = 22.7  // 32-bit float

演算子.title: Operators
演算子.code:
x := 5
x++
fmt.Println("x + 4 =", x + 4)
fmt.Println("x * 4 =", x * 4)

ブール演算子.title: Boolean Operators
ブール演算子.code:
fmt.Println(true && true)   // true
fmt.Println(true && false)  // false
fmt.Println(true || true)   // true
fmt.Println(true || false)  // true
fmt.Println(!true)          // false

配列.title: Arrays

配列の宣言.title: Array Declaration
配列の宣言.code:
var a [2]string
a[0] = "Hello"
a[1] = "World"

fmt.Println(a[0], a[1]) //=> Hello World
fmt.Println(a)   // => [Hello World]

2次元配列.title: 2D Arrays

ポインタ.title: Pointers

スライス.title: Slices
スライス.code:
s := make([]string, 3)
s[0] = "a"
s[1] = "b"
s = append(s, "d")
s = append(s, "e", "f")

fmt.Println(s)
fmt.Println(s[1])
fmt.Println(len(s))
fmt.Println(s[1:3])

定数.title: Constants
定数.code:
const s string = "constant"
const Phi = 1.618
const n = 500000000
const d = 3e20 / n
fmt.Println(d)

型変換.title: Type Conversion
型変換.code:
i := 90
f := float64(i)
u := uint(i)

// Will be equal to the character Z
s := string(i)

Intから文字列へ.title: Int to String
Intから文字列へ.code:
i := 90

// need import "strconv"
s := strconv.Itoa(i)
fmt.Println(s) // Outputs: 90

文字列関数.title: String Functions

fmt.Printf.title: fmt.Printf
fmt.Printf.code:
package main

import (
	"fmt"
	"os"
)

type point struct {
	x, y int
}

func main() {
	p := point{1, 2}
	fmt.Printf("%v\n", p)                        // => {1 2}
	fmt.Printf("%+v\n", p)                       // => {x:1 y:2}
	fmt.Printf("%#v\n", p)                       // => main.point{x:1, y:2}
	fmt.Printf("%T\n", p)                        // => main.point
	fmt.Printf("%t\n", true)                     // => TRUE
	fmt.Printf("%d\n", 123)                      // => 123
	fmt.Printf("%b\n", 14)                       // => 1110
	fmt.Printf("%c\n", 33)                       // => !
	fmt.Printf("%x\n", 456)                      // => 1c8
	fmt.Printf("%f\n", 78.9)                     // => 78.9
	fmt.Printf("%e\n", 123400000.0)              // => 1.23E+08
	fmt.Printf("%E\n", 123400000.0)              // => 1.23E+08
	fmt.Printf("%s\n", "\"string\"")             // => "string"
	fmt.Printf("%q\n", "\"string\"")             // => "\"string\""
	fmt.Printf("%x\n", "hex this")               // => 6.86578E+15
	fmt.Printf("%p\n", &p)                       // => 0xc00002c040
	fmt.Printf("|%6d|%6d|\n", 12, 345)           // => |    12|   345|
	fmt.Printf("|%6.2f|%6.2f|\n", 1.2, 3.45)     // => |  1.20|  3.45|
	fmt.Printf("|%-6.2f|%-6.2f|\n", 1.2, 3.45)   // => |1.20  |3.45  |
	fmt.Printf("|%6s|%6s|\n", "foo", "b")        // => |   foo|     b|
	fmt.Printf("|%-6s|%-6s|\n", "foo", "b")      // => |foo   |b     |

	s := fmt.Sprintf("a %s", "string")
	fmt.Println(s)

	fmt.Fprintf(os.Stderr, "an %s\n", "error")
}
